tool_description: Retrieves HTML content from web pages with customizable headers, timeout, and retry settings for robust data extraction.

url.description: The URL to fetch content from

headers.description: Additional HTTP headers as key:value strings

error_messages: Request timeout: Increase timeout value or check network connectivity
HTTP error response: Server returned an error status code - check URL validity and site availability
Invalid headers format: Headers should be formatted as 'Header-Name: Header-Value'
Connection failed: Unable to establish connection to the target URL
usage: Provide a valid URL and optionally configure headers, timeout, and redirect behavior. Returns the raw HTML content for further processing.

html_content.description: The raw HTML content of the page
